DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate safety & efficacy consecutive treatment Clobex® Spray Silkis® Ointment management plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety & Effectiveness Clobex Spray , Followed Calcitriol Ointment Management Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis moderate severe plaque psoriasis , define 3 % 20 % treatable body surface area Overall Disease Severity least 3 ( moderate ) Surface area involvement large ( > 20 % BSA ) Psoriasis involve scalp , groin , axilla , and/or intertriginous area
